Uses of Package
software.leonov.system.monitor

  • Packages that use software.leonov.system.monitor 
    Package Description
    software.leonov.system.monitor
    Classes and interfaces for monitoring JVM and system-level resource usage.
  • Classes in software.leonov.system.monitor used by software.leonov.system.monitor 
    Class and Description
    BackgroundSystemMonitor
    A thread-safe SystemMonitor implementation that asynchronously updates usage metrics using a dedicated background daemon thread.
    CpuUsage
    The Central Processing Unit (CPU) usage metrics.
    LazySystemMonitor
    A thread-safe SystemMonitor implementation that updates usage metrics on demand.
    MemoryUsage
    The system physical memory (RAM) usage metrics.
    SystemMonitor
    Monitors Java Virtual Machine (JVM) and system-level resource usage such as CPU and memory.
    UnsupportedSystemMonitor
    A SystemMonitor that does nothing.
